headline: Blackstone Inc. (BX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Blackstone Inc. on R. Dennis’s Substack by OppCost. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BX. Blackstone Inc.’s share was trading at $129.69 as of February 6th. BX’s trailing and forward P/E were 33.51 and 20.41 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Blackstone Inc. is an alternative asset management firm specializing […]

headline: Assessing Blackstone (BX) Valuation After Sharp Share Price Declines And Rising Sector Anxiety
summary: Blackstone (BX) has quickly fallen onto many watchlists after a sharp pullback in its share price. Investors are reacting to rising Treasury yields, pressure on alternative asset managers, and questions around fundraising, fees, and realizations. See our latest analysis for Blackstone. The recent pullback fits into a broader loss of momentum, with a 1 month share price return showing a 19.41% decline and a year to date share price return showing a 23.63% decline, even though the 5 year total...
